springSecurityModuleWebSecurityConfiguration() - Method in class com.foreach.across.modules.spring.security.configuration.AcrossWebSecurityConfiguration
Workaround for the default activation in org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.security.servlet.SpringBootWebSecurityConfiguration Previously, SSM would remove the bean definition in that class, it seems more appropriate to let ConditionalOnDefaultWebSecurity not match.
